thread.section_title: MyMusicFolders.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyMusicFolders.com | mymusicfolders.com
thread.title: Bill Ades

author: Bill Ades
title: Bill Ades
text: Have never had a good experience with PayPal so I called their direct-contact phone line. My call was answered by a very pleasant and helpful gentleman who took my order and, after checking, suggested the second-lowest-cost delivery method because their experience was that it would result in delivery in 1 -- 2 days instead of the 5 days assured by the least- expensive method, for an extra 40 or 50 cents. My new music folder arrived two days later!
